name: top_posts_by_username
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool reddit.
Tool description: Please join our telegram channel to get notified about updates. https://t.me/social_miner_news
API description: Fetches the top posts by a specific Reddit username within a specified time frame.

username.description: The Reddit username to fetch top posts for.

time.description: The time period to consider for top posts. Allowed values are 'hour', 'day', 'week', 'month', 'year', 'all'.

cursor.description: A cursor for pagination to retrieve the next set of results.
